bug.author: rohanmeh
bug.description:
System information
TensorFlow version: 2.0 Doc Link: https://www.tensorflow.org/versions/r1.13/api_docs/python/tf/keras/activations/serialize
Correct Links https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/python/keras/activations.py is incorrect. The correct link should be https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/python/keras/activations.py. Clear Description The description is not opinionated about when to use this symbol, or what happens when arguments are passed to the symbol. Usage Example No usage example is provided. Parameters Defined Parameters are poorly defined, and not formatted appropriately. Returns Defined Returns are not defined. Raises Listed and Defined Errors are not defined.

comments.comment:
It's a documentation of Python r1.13, and the link correctly sends us to <denchmark-link:https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/r1.13/tensorflow/python/keras/activations.py>https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/r1.13/tensorflow/python/keras/activations.py</denchmark-link>
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/dynamicwebpaige>@dynamicwebpaige</denchmark-link> <denchmark-link:https://github.com/rohanmeh>@rohanmeh</denchmark-link> Am I missing soemthing here?
Is someone currently working on this?
I can handle this. I can also do the deserialize function. Do we need a separate issue / pr for that?
I have updated the entire activations doc including the functions get, serialize, deserialize, linear etc. and created a pull request.
Thanks <denchmark-link:https://github.com/asmitapoddar>@asmitapoddar</denchmark-link> , I'll go review that for you.

Are you satisfied with the resolution of your issue? <denchmark-link:https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSfaP12TRhd9xSxjXZjcZFNXPGk4kc1-qMdv3gc6bEP90vY1ew/viewform?entry.85265664=Yes&entry.2137816233=25828>Yes</denchmark-link>
<denchmark-link:https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSfaP12TRhd9xSxjXZjcZFNXPGk4kc1-qMdv3gc6bEP90vY1ew/viewform?entry.85265664=No&entry.2137816233=25828>No</denchmark-link>
